val:
Hello! Interestingly, I have been a student of Bio-Maths in my high school. Got introduced to programming in my freshman year at BIT Mesra, since then I started developing web and ML projects and completed my Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering (2016-2020) with 86.3% aggregate.

Today, I'm currently working as a scrum developer responsible for several microservices code development and testing in Amdocs Technology Billing and RTB project.

I have also been awarded as Runners-Up in Project ICE(Innovative and Creative Environment) Fair by Amdocs.

Here is a list of the technologies that I currently work with!
